LanguageData.WhitePhosphorusBomb.label: Phosphorus bomb
LanguageData.TrapIED_WhitePhosphorus.label: Phosphorus mine
LanguageData.TrapIED_WhitePhosphorus.description: An explosive device containing white phosphorus, connected to a trigger, which explodes when touched or struck by a bullet. Since it is hidden in the surrounding area, it cannot be placed near other traps. Animals can sense this when they are calm.
